wrote:
> They found him in The Sun...

Well i read it but i still dont believe it,so what he is saying,is 
that he is the only living samurai in the world,im still laughing 
now,and i read it nearly an hour ago,so let me get this straight all 
you have to do is train in martial arts,and get adoppted into a 
samurai family and i will become a samurai,its that simple,well i 
never,if only i had known that a few years ago,i may well have been 
shogun,yes i like the ring of that,anyway time for a reality 
check,if he was well up on his history he would know that the 
samurai do not exist anymore,so how can he go around calling himself 
the only samurai outside of japan.
Well they got part of the title right,Karl is the lost no not 
samurai,more like lost in the head.

Thanks for that tom you made my day,cheers

Dave..............
